column5: Looks like everyone had a good time up at Lakair!!  I was going to try and get over there but I was down in Toronto.  I stopped in at Basspro on the way back up North and found out that X-raps are on sale, I think 25% off so I picked up a few.  Anyways hope everyone is well and wasn't affected by the storms in the South over the weekend.  Mike
